name: Next.js Route: GCS List Objects
description: List GCS objects from a Route Handler.

files.template:
import { Storage } from '@google-cloud/storage';
export async function GET(){ const storage = new Storage(); const [files] = await storage.bucket(process.env.GCS_BUCKET!).getFiles(); return Response.json({ keys: files.map(f=>f.name) }); }
